languages.text: "Жестокий у вас дар, Леди-Навигатор, — я бы не хотел видеть гниль в людских душах, мне и того, что снаружи, с головой хватает".
languages.translation_comment:
Start of Chapter 3, after the RT's inauguration at the end of Chapter 2.
Cassia: "I still remember the Magnae Accessio ceremony... A magnificent celebration, but so many false colours..."

traits.locale_text: "Жестокий у вас дар, Леди-Навигатор, — я бы не хотел видеть гниль в людских душах, мне и того, что снаружи, с головой хватает".

languages.text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
languages.translation_comment:
Start of Chapter 3, after the RT's inauguration at the end of Chapter 2.
Cassia: "I still remember the Magnae Accessio ceremony... A magnificent celebration, but so many false colours..."
languages.original_text: "Жестокий у вас дар, Леди-Навигатор, — я бы не хотел видеть гниль в людских душах, мне и того, что снаружи, с головой хватает".

traits.locale_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
"Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
"Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
"Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
"Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
"Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

languages.text: 「あなたの『能力』は、なんとも残酷ですね、レディ・ナヴィゲイター。私は人の魂の腐敗など見たくありません。外見だけでも、もう十分すぎるほどですから」
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたの『能力』は、なんとも残酷ですね、レディ・ナヴィゲイター。私は人の魂の腐敗など見たくありません。外見だけでも、もう十分すぎるほどですから」

languages.text: "Eure Gabe ist grausam, Lady Navigator. Ich würde nicht gern die Fäulnis in den Seelen der Leute sehen. Was ich außen sehe, reicht mir schon."
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: "Eure Gabe ist grausam, Lady Navigator. Ich würde nicht gern die Fäulnis in den Seelen der Leute sehen. Was ich außen sehe, reicht mir schon."

languages.text: « Votre don est bien cruel, dame navigatrice. Je ne vous envie pas votre capacité à percevoir la pourriture dans l'âme d'autrui... Ce que je vois à l'extérieur est largement suffisant. »
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: « Votre don est bien cruel, dame navigatrice. Je ne vous envie pas votre capacité à percevoir la pourriture dans l'âme d'autrui... Ce que je vois à l'extérieur est largement suffisant. »

languages.text: «Posee usted un don muy cruel, lady navegante. Yo no desearía ver la podredumbre en el alma de las personas; con lo que veo por fuera ya tengo más que suficiente».
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: «Posee usted un don muy cruel, lady navegante. Yo no desearía ver la podredumbre en el alma de las personas; con lo que veo por fuera ya tengo más que suficiente».

languages.text: “你的天赋真的是太残忍了，导航者女士。换做是我，我可不想看到人们灵魂的脓疮，光是外在的那些东西就已经够让人受不了了。”
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: “你的天赋真的是太残忍了，导航者女士。换做是我，我可不想看到人们灵魂的脓疮，光是外在的那些东西就已经够让人受不了了。”

languages.text: "Meşum bir yeteneğin var Leydi Rotacı. İnsanların çürümüş ruhları bir yana, yüzlerini görmeye zor katlanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."

traits.locale_text: "Meşhum bir yeteneğiniz var Leydi Rotacı. İnsanların çürümüş ruhları bir yana, yüzlerini görmeye zor katlanıyorum."

languages.original_text: "Yours is a cruel gift, Lady Navigator. I wouldn't want to see the rot in people's souls — what I can see on the outside is more than enough."
